author: Alfred Doe
comment: Its not all too simple, but once you find out the working, it's simple. It is exactly like "stock alarm" except this lets your set your own music to the alarm:), since you listened last time, I was wondering can you add a dividend tracker to this app, plus also a display of the dividend in decimal  points $, not in percentages. 😁☺please, please would really help. plus if you can add a notification if a stock changes it's dividend. have never found an app to do that, so you would be breaking new grounds.🤞🙏then it would be a 5 star app.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
Dividend data are retrieved from yahoo and are always a pecentage.
can not add alert in a dividend change sorry

author: Cat T.
comment: Very well-designed app and all of the information I need is right up front and easy to read. I'm having trouble, though, finding after-hours quotes. I just started using it so I'll keep looking. EDIT: Thank you for your reply. I understand now why after-hour quotes are unavailable.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Sorry since september when google stopped some financial apis after hours quotes are not supported

author: Minerva Thomas
comment: Cool push notification feature

author: Navid Attayan
comment: Improvements needed: 1.the whole stock vs fund vs etf thing has good intentions but it really just makes everything more confusing than it needs to be, make the portfolios more seamless. 2. Add dividends to the total P/L of the stock/fund. 3. It's a pain the @$$ having to add stocks and funds separately each time under each portfolio. It's not easy to use and needs to become more seamless.  Other than these much needed improvements for the actual active investor, this app has potential.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
1)In stocks you should be able to find also etfs, currencies and so on (but no funds) if you prefer to keep all together
Once you have all in stocks you can add all to a single portfolio. 
2) You are wrong. Dividend is not accounted in actual gain but in historical gains, like when you sell a stock.
Check how your bank handles it
3) See 1)

author: Joyee Basu
comment: Thank you very much for this app. My request remains, that if you ever have that time, plz make this app for ios. That platform is really underdeveloped. Till then I am going to use it on my Android. Thanks again 🙏🏽

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Thanks. Sorry but app is only for android. An ios version would require to rewrite it completely and i have not the time

author: Jorge Blackshaw
comment: App stinks and very frustrating! A total waste of time trying to figure out how it works cause they make it difficult! It sucks!!!  Response: App didn't say "watch Utube video" to figure me out! And if I have to watch a Utube video to figure out your app, then my original review stands... It stinks!!!!

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: I spent time to make a tutorial vid you should  show some respect for my work, but i'm asking too much. If you have tips to improve app they are welcomed

author: Bernard Cusack
comment: Perfect app for monitoring stocks and super user friendly.  Well done.

author: Alberto Sierra
comment: Simple and functional, but still a lot of things to fix. If the app does not consider currency the value of the portfolio is wrong when you have stocks in different currencies. Not useful.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: You have to set a main portfolio currency and a currency for every portfolio (in settings). All portfolios will be translated to main currency. If you already added portfolio positions you will need to edit them entering the conversion rate at the time of operation. If you need further help you can write me to support@webxperience.it

author: William Landreth
comment: Comsidering it is for a smart watch, it does actually work pretty well. The confused leaving bad reviews have an excellent point however: it took 20 minutes for me to find the magnifying glass and enter the ticker (or company name) and then I accidentally didn't hit the check-mark and had to do it all over again. And apparently there is actually no way at all to add any currency though it appears as if there is. Kind of confusing but works to get the watch to work.....

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback William. Search currencies using yahoo symbols ie EURUSD. I know it can be not easy at first but there's a tutorial vid to help beginners.

author: Troy Cook
comment: Bug so cant add stock to portfolio

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
Can you explain what's the problem? I'm not experiencing any issue with portfolio.
You can have a look at this tutorial vid https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vacCHbInZZw and write me if you need help

comment: I love it

author: Colin Jacobson
comment: Had a small problem that Stefano promptly sorted out. Great service and a great app! Emailed him on another occasion and he responded within a couple of hours. How good is that!

author: Paolo Bertozzi
comment: Fantastic app, smart interface and very easy to use. Update: I had some questions and wrote a few mail to developer. He answered kindly and fast. Great!

author: Raja Paranjape
comment: Div yield does not populate.  Good app otherwise.  Would be nice if settings menu would allow a choice of parameters to track

author: Candice
comment: Still can't see updated stock prices. Note that it's due to Google. Any chance it will be resolved soon?

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Have no idea but i fear they suspended the service

author: Francesco Lupis
comment: Lately, data has not been updating. It is not real time and some data is from 8/31.  An average app when it is working

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: I'm sorry but google services are not working. I hope it's a temporary problem and google will fix it soon

author: Pranay Naxikar
comment: Deta not updating

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: I'm sorry but google services are not working. I hope it's a temporary problem and google will fix it soon

author: Basim Khalid
comment: Great app. Simple and straightforward

author: Jonathan Wendland
comment: So far so good, love the organization, use it over my brokers app. Wish the analyst opinions worked.   Even on large stock like Google or Apple I still havent seen any analyst opinions.  Does anyone know how often if ever there are opinions put in?

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Analyst opinion is not working anymore since yahoo finance website changed the page. Sorry for the problem

author: Benjamin Reemts
comment: This could be the best app but it's useless cause currency conversion does not work. Try to set you currency to euro and add 'BP' to your stocks.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: You have to set a portfolio currency and a main currency to convert from portfolio to main currency. Portoflio currency conversion is working fine.

author: Prashant Deshmukh
comment: Extremely useful app with state of the art alert feature makes it most unique. Hats off to developers.
The app is fine and works pretty well. Stefano did help to solve problems.

author: Ari
comment: Excellent app most links to news work really well.  All info updated regularly.  Would be good to remove Real Time from the title since it is not realtime for stocks such as TSX Index stocks.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
Dividend is shown if available from yahoo finance. And when between a buy and sell operation there's a dividend is accounted in portfolio.
Logo is removed and font size decreased in next update.

author: Andrea Ghidini
comment: Very nice, however the fund charts are always empty, only the donut portfolio chart is working. Am I missing something obvious?

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Next update should improve charts. Anyway historical charts are not available for every fund, depends on yahoo finance availability.

author: Janice Eirich
comment: Nice interface but I search for ticker symbols and get "no results". Futures , "ES", no results. Really?

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Probably because there are too many results. Use a more specific filter, like ES16. Or search in yahoo finance webpage and use the same ticker. New version 8.6.0 will improve search.

author: Arno Rademeyer
comment: Please add functionality for multiple alerts per share. Example if above 2.5 or below 2, above 3 and below etc.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: You can check below and above at the sime time. But you will only get a notification. If you have any questions mail me to support@webxperience.it

author: Helen Macdonald
comment: Not what I need.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: App description is quite accurate..did you take 1 min to read it?

author: Guilherme M. Nogueira
comment: Awesome!
This app is pretty neat, I like how I can sync the information to my watch. It took me a while to figure out how to add a stock, but that was my fault - I'm not very familiar with Android 7.

author: METALJOKER
comment: How can I find Gold and Silver?! 🤔

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
You can search in yahoo finance website and use the same ticker in the app.
For gold, in future section search 'gold aug 17' for example and add GC=F

author: bülent alkan
comment: Sucks

author: Clem Wright
comment: Should handle the case where watch app is installed before phone app, and have Wear 2.0 complication support. See standalone section of g.co/wearpreview

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Latest version (for both phone and watch) should notify when phone app is not installed.

author: Ben Bezuidenhout
comment: Awesome, love the live notification of JSE South Africa stock.

author: AzontoBoi
comment: Finally an nice clean UI that supports short positions as well. Def would recommend over the other portfolio management app. Well done sir!

author: Nico Coetzee
comment: Great application.

author: Chong Wee Jye
comment: Pls add klci

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
I can't add anything. quotes are retrieved from google or yahoo, if not available there's nothing i can do.
And is really stupid to give a bad rating because of something is not my fault.

author: Prasanna Ramasubramanian
comment: Not able to select stocks to delete in wdit mode. Scroll bar on the right crops up and gets clicked instead of the check box every single time. Very frustrating. Please move check box away from the far right.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Just click the stock name to check it (no need to click on checkbox)

author: Greeku Veerudu
comment: Excellent product but cannot use it. I just can't get the data refreshed easily... Takes long and unreliable

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
It depends what you are updating
Stocks should be fast.. funds can take a long time

title: Cannot find the latest values refreshed

author: Angel K
comment: Developer's response was instantaneous. Ability to add notes is a big plus. Only problem is some ASX stocks can't be found in the search eg. INM iron mountain & CYB clydesdale bank
title: Very handy

author: Gagan Singh
comment: Needs cloud integration or integration with Robinhood. Lost all of my inputted data when my phone broke. Edit: needs automatic backup to cloud

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: You can backup data and store in google drive

title: Great app.  Just one thing missing
